title: The rise of intelligent endpoint security: How AI is changing the game
description: Endpoints are the new front lines in cybersecurity. With employees using laptops, smartphones, tablets, and more to connect to their work from anywhere, productivity is increasing. But organisations are now more exposed than ever to a constant flow of threats, such as ransomware, phishing attacks, or zero-day exploits. These threats are not picky, they will go after the weak link, usually at the endpoint. The post The rise of intelligent endpoint security: How AI is changing the game appeared first on Express Computer.

title: Samsung taps new AI talent in biggest reshuffle in years
description: Samsung Electronics on Tuesday carried out its largest executive promotion round in recent years, elevating a wave of rising leaders in AI, robotics and advanced chips as the tech giant accelerates a generational shift for the AI era. In its annual reshuffle, Samsung promoted 161 employees to executive positions — a sharp increase from 143 in 2023 and 137 in 2024 — signaling a pivot toward younger, next-generation leadership capable of steering the tech giant through intensifying global competit

title: Oakley Meta HSTN AI glasses set to launch in India on Dec 1: Price, features and everything new
description: Oakley Meta HSTN AI smart glasses are launching in India on December 1, bringing Meta-powered AI features, hands-free capture, Hindi voice support and more.
